programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep51
programme.desc: Tall Tail/Bfff - Creek arrives at a Trolls potluck empty-handed, explaining that a strange creature ate the fondue he meant to bring. The Trolls nod sympathetically, but Branch alone doesn’t believe this clearly made-up story. He sets out to prove Creek is a liar./ Branch presents Trolls Village with a time capsule which will survive the ages. The Trolls are excited by the prospect of making friends with future Trolls. Now if only they could agree what should actually go in the time capsule.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep51
programme.desc: I, Maurice - When Maurice learns that he isn't a lemur like everyone else, he sets off on a journey to find his Aye-Aye parents and sister Brosalind

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep25
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Taxing Trauma Of The Treacherous Tattle Trials Part I - In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.desc: Rupert’S Magic Car - Miranda the Mermaid has never been able to visit Nutwood - until Rupert has a clever idea

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Rupert And The Unusual Birthday - It's Edward's birthday and Rupert wants to give him the best birthday party ever. Ping Pong tries to speed things up by using her magic but it turns everything topsy-turvy. How can Rupert give Edward his party now?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep13
programme.desc: Rumble In The Jungle - Zebby is upset when Raa Raa laughs at her rumbling tummy and runs off to hide. Raa Raa sets out to find his friend and apologise… he thinks it will be easy, he just has to listen out for the sound of her tummy, but who knew how many other rumbling noises there were?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep14
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Favourite Noise - Raa Raa is inspired by his friends to search for his favourite noise in the jingly jangly jungle. The little lion cub and his friends set out to find out what Raa Raa's Favourite Noise could be…

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep13
programme.desc: Postman Pat’S Camping Chaos - Lauren and Sara lead a camping trip to the Scottish Highlands, but disaster strikes when Ajay and PC Selby are stuck in Pencaster with the tent and cooking equipment. Pat must transport them to the Highlands in the SDS Plane and put up the tent before nightfall in order to accomplish his mission. When a Highland cow gets into the tent and refuses to leave, Pat comes up with a plan for Alf to team up with Bill and coax the cow out with their father-and-son cow call - and Bill helps Alf move his own cow, who turns out to be missing Bill.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep14
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The King'S Armour - It's Knights and Dragons Day at school and Pat has to travel to a Welsh castle to pick up some ancient artefacts and Sarah Gilbertson's Auntie Jackie! Pat is rather partial to a suit of armour - and when he's presented with a real one at the castle, he can't resist trying it on! But the suit gets stuck shut, leaving the excitable children wondering where their artefacts are! As they wait, Sarah Gilbertson starts telling them tales of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys and her ancestor ‘King Gilbertson' and his knightly adventures, which Bill is loathe to believe. Unable to free himself from the suit of armour, Pat has no choice but to fly back Greendale wearing it! At the school, the children are enraptured when the plane lands and a real knight steps out! It must be ‘King Gilbertson'! To Sarah G's delight, Auntie Jackie emerges from the plane - and Bill becomes a hero when he discovers to real purpose of the mysterious Stone of Penrhys - it opens the suit of armour!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep65
programme.desc: Bumble'S Special Lunch - Fifi has invited the other tots over to lunch but she is not very well. Bumble gamely steps in and offers to cook for her. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Daddy Shack - After a selfish fish takes over the putt-putt, Baby Shark and William must find a champion mini-golf player to defeat him.

programme.desc: Pups Save the Dizzy Dust Express / Pups Save the Treetop Trekkers - When the Dizzy Dust Express appears with no one aboard, the Paw Patrol must stop the runaway train and find the missing passengers. // Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops on their jungle zip-lining adventure.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep224
programme.desc: Paddington's Pet Hotel / Paddington Plays Golf - Paddington opens Windsor Gardens' first ever pet hotel when he has Lucky to stay over. // Baaz has set up a mini golf course at the park, but is it really unbeatable like he says and how should you hold a club Paddington?

programme.desc: Bedtime Story - Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story. Later George wakes up again, so Peppa has to make up another story.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep423
programme.desc: Pups Save Luke Stars / Pups Save Chicken Day - Katie is going to perform her contest-winning song with Luke Stars! But Luke Stars gets stuck on a mountain ledge on his way to Adventure Bay. // Chickaletta goes missing on Chicken Day! The PAW Patrol have to find her to save the festivites.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep604
programme.desc: Pups Save the Honey - Yumi's Yummy Honey is all the buzz when it - and her beehive - go missing from her farm!

programme.desc: Lola's Air Display / Down The Sewers - Lola is worried her air display will not be impressive enough, but when Sir Steel joins, the air display goes wrong in a spectacular way! // When Sir Steel's dog Muffin's ball goes missing down the sewers, Bobbi has to face his fear of the dark.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave - Paddington learns about bees & decides to help them make honey by planting a flower garden but someone thinks they're weeds! // There's a heatwave in Windsor Gardens & Mateo has sold out of ice-creams so he and Paddington create a new flavor!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Paddington Finds a Pigeon - Paddington nurses a sick bird named Pigeonton back to health, but can he let him go?

programme.desc: Sparkle's Racing Badge - It's more Blaze family fun in this high octane, action-packed adventure as Blaze and his sister Sparkle team up to make it back to the Monster Dome in time for a big race.

programme.desc: The Enchanted Melody / Chicken Abuelo - When Escarlata gets ahold of an enchanted guitar riff, all of the underseas may soon fall under her spell. // Tomás accidentally turns Abuelo into a chicken!

programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Blue's Beach Bonanza - We've set up a tubular pretend beach in the backyard and play a game of Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to see there. We'll learn what items sink and float, and swim underwater to learn about camouflage with the help of our ocean friends.

programme.desc: Pups Save Francois the Penguin / Pups Save Daring Danny's Hippo - Francois and a baby penguin get caught on the other side of a carvasse. // Daring Danny wants a cool pet of his own, so he can't believe his luck when a stray baby hippo finds him.

programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard - Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Shake, Rattle and Bang - Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Champion Daddy Pig - Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Chatterbox - Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep167
programme.desc: The Greedy Gobbler - While Bubu and Christopher want to enjoy an hazelnut snack, their hazelnuts go missing! When Anna, Froga and Ron's chocolate snack also disappears, the friends are convinced it's the work of the GREEDY GOBBLER and the HAZELNUT PRANKSTERS.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep168
programme.desc: A Longchair for Ron - A sleeping spider squats Ron's swing, and he can't take a nap. He laments to Anna and Froga that he wishes he had a deck chair to sleep on. This gives them the idea to surprise him with one.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Roy - Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Tenderest Bond of All / The Orange Empire - While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Blue's Dino Clues - It's a prehistoric game of Blue's Clues when a mysterious dinosaur egg falls out of the skidoo frame and starts to hatch! We figure out what kind of dinosaur is inside the egg so we can reunite the egg with their family.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep616
programme.desc: Special Mission Blaze - When a nefarious villain steals every toothbrush in Axle City, Blaze's only chance at saving the day is to become: Special Mission Blaze!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep813
programme.desc: Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon - Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp. // The pups must help salmon get to the ocean and also need to rescue Alex who gets stuck on top of a dam.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep814
programme.desc: Pups Vs. Ouchy Paws / Pups Save a Glow-in-the-Dark Party - Sid Swashbuckle pretends to be a legendary ghost so that he can take Danny's new skateboard. // Ryder and the Pups race to save Mayor Goodway's Glow-in-the-Dark Party guests when a frightened Alien Boy zaps them into floating space bubbles.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Goodnight Central Forest / Steelzilla - When Sir Steel does not want to get out of bed, Professor Scratch plunges the whole city into darkness with a gigantic pair of sunglasses. // Sir Steel holds a grand parade but his giant Steel blimp grows to Godzilla sized and trashes the city!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Magnet Maelstrom - When Sir Steel collects metal in the city for Muffin's pooch pamper parlor using a giant magnet, Deer Squad has to think out of the box to stop him.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave - Paddington learns about bees & decides to help them make honey by planting a flower garden but someone thinks they're weeds! // There's a heatwave in Windsor Gardens & Mateo has sold out of ice-creams so he and Paddington create a new flavor!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over - Paddington hurts his knee & goes to see Dr Yasmin. When she steps out, he steps UP and is mistaken for a doctor. // Can Mr. Brown's sleepover live up to Mrs. Brown's high standard when Simi and Toq come to stay for the night?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Freddy Fox - Peppa and her friends are playing hide and seek, but it is Freddy Fox with his super smelling nose who is the best at playing that game.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Whistling - Peppa tries to learn how to whistle after she realizes that seemingly everyone but her can do it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep403
programme.desc: Doctor Hamster's Tortoise - Doctor Hamster the vet comes to Peppa's playgroup to show the children her pets. But Tiddles has run away. But Ms. Rabbit is going to rescue Tiddles.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Sun, Sea and Snow - Peppa and her friends and family are looking forward to a trip to the beach where they can make sandcastles, but when they arrive at the beach there is too much snow!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep608
programme.desc: The Kingdom of Sleepwell! - All is not well in the normally well-rested Kingdom of Sleepwell: Princess Deema can't fall asleep! Her Royal Court comes to her aid, but when even magic doesn't work, she learns that all she needed to do was follow her bedtime routine!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Blue's Backyard Sports Spectacular - It's a Backyard Sports Spectacular! Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game. We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Magenta feel ready to play!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Mailtime Mystery - It's a busy delivery day for Mailbox and there's a special letter that needs to be delivered, but he doesn't know who it is for! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who the letter is for.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Babysitting Heroes - Blaze and AJ are helping their friend Stripes look after some baby animals, when the little critters accidentally float away on big bubbles. Now, it's up to these three babysitters to find their adorable animal friends and save the day!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep110
programme.desc: The Enchanted Melody / Chicken Abuelo - When Escarlata gets ahold of an enchanted guitar riff, all of the underseas may soon fall under her spell. // Tomás accidentally turns Abuelo into a chicken!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Round-Up - When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep809
programme.desc: Pups Save the Treasure Cruise / Pups Save Rocket Ryder - Mayor Humdinger tricks people to sail icy waters in search of an Antarctic treasure but they all need rescued when they get stranded on shore. // The pups need to rescue Ryder and Alex when they get out of control on a rocket-powered ATV.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep226
programme.desc: Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog - Paddington & the Kids overhear Mr. Brown talking about selling the house! Will they really have to leave Windsor Gardens? // The kids are playing in the garden & make a prickly discovery. Something is not right so Paddington asks Baaz to help.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep520
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Train to the Rescue - Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep521
programme.desc: The Pet Competition - Playgroup is having a pet competition and everyone has brought their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but it is so hard to choose the best pet...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep523
programme.desc: The Noisy Night - Peppa's family is staying at Cousin Chloe's house. It's been a long day and everyone is sleepy. But baby Alexander keeps everyone awake with his crying!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep167
programme.desc: The Greedy Gobbler - While Bubu and Christopher want to enjoy an hazelnut snack, their hazelnuts go missing! When Anna, Froga and Ron's chocolate snack also disappears, the friends are convinced it's the work of the GREEDY GOBBLER and the HAZELNUT PRANKSTERS.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep168
programme.desc: A Longchair for Ron - A sleeping spider squats Ron's swing, and he can't take a nap. He laments to Anna and Froga that he wishes he had a deck chair to sleep on. This gives them the idea to surprise him with one.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep84
programme.desc: Musical Statues - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po enjoy a game of musical statues. It takes the Teletubbies a few turns to work out what to do when the music stops; they must stand very still.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S3) Ep9
programme.desc: Digger - Dee encourages a friend to say 'digger' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of diggers - a big digger, a small digger, a dumping digger and a really muddy digger!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep44
programme.desc: Shop Up Top - A Po has a dream to open a shop... but her spot on a popular walking trail is all wrong.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) Ep43
programme.desc: It's time for a special visitor - It is a cold Winter afternoon, the trees are bare and the air is frosty. JoJo and Gran Gran wait for Mummy and Daddy to bring back a special visitor from the airport - Great Gran Gran!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep71
programme.desc: Honestly, Monty - Monty becomes nervous when he breaks Jeanie's project and doesn't know whether to tell her. He soon learns that you should always be honest.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep70
programme.desc: Jimmy Jones Rules - Monty tries to tell his family that Jimmy is not just a toy, but much more. Whether they believe him is another story.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep21
programme.desc: Blue Mountains - Bluey, Bingo, Mum and Dad play a game of hand puppets, exploring the land beyond the Blue Mountains where they outsmart the Cheeky Fox to find the softest ever beds.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep50
programme.desc: The What Happened Badge - The Squirrels try and tell us what has just happened but are struggling to retell the story correctly.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep49
programme.desc: The Building Block Badge - The Squirrels become architects so they can design, build and bring to life their very own clubhouse.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep48
programme.desc: The Reunion Badge - Duggee hosts a reunion for the first ever Squirrels he looked after. But the first ever Squirrels are older now and very similar to the Squirrels' parents. Does that mean that when the Squirrels are bigger, they will become like their parents, too?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep30
programme.desc: The Boreal Forest, Canada - Glitch travels to Ontario to find a new teddy bear, but things start to go very wrong...

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep29
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Map Readers - Glitch races the Go Jetters across the Academy to find the lost G.O. Dome of the Ancients.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep20
programme.desc: Markets - When Bluey visits the markets with five bucks from the tooth fairy, the options are endless. But as she and Indy look for the perfect purchase, spending it proves hard.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep19
programme.desc: The Claw - When Bluey and Bingo are unable to grab a prize on a Magic Claw machine, Mum and Dad create their own version at home. But Dad isn't about to make winning easy.

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: Andy and the Arctic Fox - Andy goes to record an arctic fox hunting, but is chased by a polar bear and faces a snow storm. He finds safety with some walrus.

programme.title: Grace's Amazing Machines (S1) Ep19
programme.desc: Forestry Machines - Grace helps drive a tree harvester, shows off an amazing tree-planting machine and then gathers logs with a tree-forwarding machine.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Captain's Best Bits - In this special compilation episode, Squawk takes us on a journey to find Captain Captain's top Swashbuckle moments. We will see her silliest songs, most marvellous moments and messiest slops.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep47
programme.desc: The Counting Badge - The Squirrels try the ultimate achievement of counting to 100 to earn their counting badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep46
programme.desc: The Perfume Badge - The Squirrels make their very own perfumes with accompanying advertisements to show how their perfumes are uniquely theirs.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep45
programme.desc: The Direction Badge - The Squirrels go out for a walk but can't find a way back to the clubhouse. Through a series of unusual methods, the Squirrels learn all about direction.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep28
programme.desc: Wolong Panda Reserve, China - The Go Jetters visit a nature reserve in China. But who's taking all the pandas' bamboo?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) Ep27
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Compass Navigators - Can Kyan and Foz use new compass skills to navigate their way out of an academy maze?

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S15) Ep3
programme.desc: Emily and Dash - Emily is given the job of looking after Dash on a trip to the steam fair. Dash shows Emily how to make special noises with his whistle, but he does it so often, he runs out of fuel and gets stuck.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep39
programme.desc: Snowball Skate - Sarah and Duck explore a Winter Fair in the park, and discover an amazing skating rink inside a giant snowball!

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep38
programme.desc: Cinema Scoot - Sarah and Duck join Scooter Boy at the cinema to watch his favourite film.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Stick to the Trees - Nelly and Nora try to stick the Autumn leaves back on the trees.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep38

programme.desc: Start your weekend informed and up-to-date as Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim bring you the latest news, interviews, analysis, politics, culture and weather. Plus finance with David Chau and sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast Ep45
programme.desc: Start your weekend informed and fully up-to-date as Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim bring you the latest news, in-depth analysis, politics, interviews, weather, culture and global affairs. Plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: ABC News Ep89
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep42
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor presents the week's main international news, as reported by ABC News correspondents deployed in Bangkok, Beirut, Istanbul, Jakarta, Jerusalem, London, New Delhi, Port Moresby, Taipei, Tokyo and Washington.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep89
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep42
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters across the country uncover the news and unique stories about what's going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: Inside Central Station Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Sydney is in the grip of one of the worst weather events in decades. Over 48 hours, the city is drenched by more than 300 millimetres of rain causing chaos on the Network.

programme.title: ABC News Ep89
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep23
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - Showcasing the achievements and inspiring stories of Pacific athletes in Australia and around the world. Host Tiana Penitani will be joined by athletes with Pacific heritage including Sam Wykes, Sera Naiqama and Tyson Pedro.

programme.title: AFLW - Finals Week 1 Ep62
programme.desc: After 10 Rounds of the AFLW regular season, 18 teams have been whittled down to the top teams in the Finals Series.

programme.title: AFLW - Finals Week 1 Ep63
programme.desc: Australia's leading women's footballers take part in Season 7 of the AFLW between August and December 2022. Four new teams - Essendon, Hawthorn, Port Adelaide and Sydney join the competition to make up 18 teams.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep45
programme.desc: Live across Australia, the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and live coverage of events as they unfold. Plus comprehensive analysis, context and original investigations from ABC reporters around the world.

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame - Manu Feildel Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 6 - French chef Manu Feildel's passion for entertaining has made him a regular on our TV screens over the last decade. Anh captures the desire, determination and flair of a man who has worked hard for every opportunity.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep31
programme.desc: Sr. 33 - Inspiring, entertaining and full of practical advice, join Costa Georgiadis and the team as they unearth gardening ideas, meet avid gardeners and look at some of the most inspiring gardens from across the country.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Fish Creek Church House Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Peter Riedel, an engineer and his interior designer wife Mary, plan to re-build the church on their property, overlooking Wilsons Promontory and convert it into a house.

programme.title: Escape From The City - Margaret River WA: The Kadamuses Ep40
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Deb and Milo have set their sights on finding their next home on the other side of the country. Presenter Jane Hall accompanies the couple as they inspect both rustic rural homes and modern chic dwellings.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep26
programme.desc: The award-winning series with no narrator and no agendas, bringing you incredible and authentic stories told entirely in people's own words. They're sometimes high profile, sometimes controversial, but always compelling.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep29
programme.desc: Australia's window on the world - bringing you in-depth, on-the-ground reporting to explain what's happening and why. Plus compelling storytelling that reveals the intimate human stories behind global events. (Final for 2022)

programme.title: Four Corners Ep37
programme.desc: The longest running show on Australian TV, this award-winning current affairs documentary series is a powerhouse of investigative journalism - fearless and forensic, holding power to account through six decades and counting.

programme.title: Kurt Fearnley's One Plus One - Mat Rogers Ep9
programme.desc: Mat Rogers reached the pinnacle representing Australia in rugby league and union, but spent much of his life in his father Steve's shadow. Mat speaks candidly about his mental health struggles and trying to pave his own path.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep89
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news.

programme.title: Media Watch Ep37
programme.desc: Everybody loves it until they're on it! Australia's leading forum for media analysis and critique, we have been exposing conflicts of interest, journalistic deceit, misrepresentation, manipulation and plagiarism since 1989.

programme.desc: Introducing a colorful variety of feature stories, including reports on daily life from locations throughout Japan, as well as other parts of Asia and around the world.

programme.title: Design Talks Plus
programme.desc: Today's theme: Water. Japan's rich wealth of water is reflected in its culture. Designer Tatsuno Shizuka explores product, architecture, and technology designs that all draw on the power of water.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Ukiyoe Edo-Life: Off To Go Bathing
programme.desc: A mother and daughter brave the rain to visit their local bathhouse, exchanging words with a young girl along the way. We learn that regular bathing was an essential part of life for the townspeople.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Japan
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan presents a variety of short programs focusing on Japan and Asia.

programme.title: Japan From Above: Up Close
programme.desc: This program takes you on an aerial journey across 21st century Japan. Enjoy the bird's-eye view of unique landscapes as well as intimate portraits of the people who inhabit the archipelago.

programme.title: Lunch On!
programme.desc: This entire episode is dedicated to featuring amazing lunch stories from our viewers across the world, and we seriously suggest that you do not miss out on this incredibly delicious tour!

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini
programme.desc: Japanology Plus explores Japanese life and culture. In this 5-minute digest, we look at rice snacks: traditional food with surprising diversity.

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.title: Newsline In Depth

programme.title: Asia Insight
programme.desc: While migrant workers helped build Shenzhen into the third largest economy in China, many end up exhausted and homeless. One man, a migrant himself, has been helping those in need for 20 years.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Father Greg has rehabilitated thousands of ex-gang members in Los Angeles for 30 years. He runs a bakery as a base with members, has tattoo removal programs among others so they can re-enter society.

programme.title: Bento Expo
programme.desc: From Marc, a crispy chicken cutlet with creamy egg sauce. Meanwhile, Maki makes a finger food version of Omurice. Bento Topics features the food culture of Japan's popular island resort, Okinawa.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Yumi Hayakawa creates one-of-a-kind textiles. Living at near total self-sufficiency, whether food as compost or cloth as material, no scraps are wasted. Valuing the cycle of life.

programme.title: TM Piala Malaysia 2022 SEL lwn KLU
programme.desc: Perlawanan TM Piala Malaysia Super 2022 Pusingan 16 diantara pasukan SELANGOR FC dan KELANTAN UNITED FC di Stadium Majlis Bandaraya Petaling Jaya

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep1
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep7
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Road To UFC Ep2
programme.desc: ROAD TO UFC is a ground-breaking “win and advance” tournament that gives top MMA prospects from Asia a pathway to a UFC contract. Eight mixed martial arts athletes will compete in each of four men’s weight classes: flyweight, bantamweight, featherweight and lightweight. The opening round is divided into four episodes, each of which includes four tournament bouts and one additional non-tournament bout. These non-tournament bouts are included for promising prospects whose divisions might not have been included in ROAD TO UFC.
